entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening with rain showers changing to flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then north 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 7:48 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
